ChatGPT is not the best at everything.

Here is the best AI to learn (anything):

→→ https://lnkd.in/dMcU-Cn6 ←←

✦ It's called NotebookLM.
✦ Entirely free, directly from Google.
✦ Built to learn exactly what YOU want to learn.

Here is a step-by-step guide on how to use it best:

Step 1. Create your own notebook.

☑ Go to notebooklm.google.com.
☑ Click on "Create a new notebook".
☑ Upload sources, like YouTube videos, PDFs...
☑ You can upload up to 50 sources. That's a lot.

This is what makes NotebookLM better than ChatGPT: you control what the AI knows & says.

Step 2. Explore the different features.

☑ Chat with it like ChatGPT.
☑ Create a podcast from your sources.
☑ You can (literally) join the podcast and talk to AI.
☑ Create a mindmap, quizzes, flashcards, reports...

The podcast is by far the craziest AI feature I have tested this year. It feels like a fever dream. Unreal. 

Step 3. Access my favorite notebooks.

☑ Email expert: https://lnkd.in/dyGf5fhc.
☑ Power expert: https://lnkd.in/dwqBexXz.
☑ Storytelling expert: https://lnkd.in/diwYnSwm.

Bonus: Master NotebookLM today.

I wrote a guide on my blog to master NotebookLM:
↳ click here: https://lnkd.in/dMcU-Cn6.

At the end of this newsletter, you will master:

1. How to find the best YouTube videos.
2. How to best use NotebookLM with YouTube.
3. Access all of my personal notebooks, with links.
